original_text: And the remnant of the oil that is in the priest's hand he shall pour upon the head of him that is to be cleansed: and the priest shall make an atonement for him before the Lord.
korean_text: 아직도 그 손에 남은 기름은 제사장이 그 정결함을 받는 자의 머리에 바르고 제사장은 여호와 앞에서 그를 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: And the remnant of the oil
that is in the priest's hand
he shall pour upon the head
of him that is to be cleansed
and the priest shall make an atonement for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그를 위해 속죄할 것이다
